about_the_game:
Ghosty’s Big Adventure

Step into the paws of Ghosty, brave and curious, half cat & half ghost and on an epic 2D action-adventure! Explore vibrant, hand-drawn worlds filled with exciting quests, quirky characters, and mysterious creatures. Along the way, you’ll chat with NPCs, lend a helping paw, and solve tricky challenges as you uncover secrets and discover what it takes to be a true adventurer!

Features:

• Explore multiple worlds: From spiky forests to underground castles, each realm is packed with new surprises and secrets!

• Interact with NPCs: Meet friendly faces that will guide you, give you quests, and share their stories.

• Physics-based gameplay: Feel the natural flow of the world as objects move and react in fun and unexpected ways!

Can you help Ghosty become an adventurer just like her grandma? Grab your backpack, adventurer book and start your journey!

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
